ll-eng
put lost lost
----
"lost" -> "lost"♱

ll-eng
crash
----
ok

ll-eng sync=true
put k1 v1
put k2 v2
----
"k1" -> "v1"⚐
"k2" -> "v2"⚐

ll-eng
get k1
get k2
get k3
----
k1: v1
k2: v2
k3: ∅

ll-eng
crash
----
"k1" -> "v1"
"k2" -> "v2"

ll-eng
put k1 v1b
put k3 v3
----
"k1" -> "v1b"♱ "v1"
"k2" -> "v2"
"k3" -> "v3"♱

ll-eng
flush
----
"k1" -> "v1b"
"k2" -> "v2"
"k3" -> "v3"

ll-eng
del k1
----
"k1" -> "∅"♱ "v1b"
"k2" -> "v2"
"k3" -> "v3"

ll-eng sync=true
----
"k1" -> "∅"⚐ "v1b"
"k2" -> "v2"
"k3" -> "v3"

ll-eng
del k2
del k3
----
"k1" -> "∅"⚐ "v1b"
"k2" -> "∅"♱ "v2"
"k3" -> "∅"♱ "v3"

ll-eng
flush
----
ok
